Test Name: Maple Syrup Urine Disease (MSUD) Gene Panel
Purpose: To detect pathogenic variants in genes associated with Maple Syrup Urine Disease for clinical diagnosis and management.
Container: EDTA blood tube or saliva collection kit
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, PCR thermocycler, Illumina MiSeq sequencer, spectrophotometer (e.g., NanoDrop), fluorometer (e.g., Qubit)
